member.name: T:Services.Core.Controllers.TelemetryController
member.summary: Provides endpoints for retrieval of telemetry data.

member.name: M:Services.Core.Controllers.TelemetryController.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Services.Core.Controllers.TelemetryController},Logic.DataAccess.TableStorage.ITableStorageAdapter{Logic.DataAccess.TableStorage.TelemeryTableEntity})
member.param: The table adapter to retrieve data.

member.name: M:Services.Core.Controllers.TelemetryController.Get(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieves a list of telemtry entries ordered by timestamp descendently.
member.param: The optional amount of entries to retrieve or null if all entries should be delivered.
